node.doctext:
[% my $str; if($query->param('title') and $query->param('author')){ my $text; $text.=""; $text.=""; $text.="[".($query->param('user') || $$USER{title})."]"; $text.=""; $text.=""; $text.=$query->param('title'); $text.=""; $text.=""; $text.=$query->param('author'); $text.=""; $text.=""; $text.="[isbn://".$query->param('isbn')."]" if $query->param('isbn'); $text.=""; $text.="\n"; $$NODE{doctext}=~s/<\/AddBookHere>/$text<\/AddBookHere>/; updateNode($NODE,-1); $str.="Your entry has been added: ".linkNode($NODE," view the list"); } $str.=htmlcode('openform'); $str.="user:".$query->textfield(-name=>'user',-length=>30)."
" if isGod($USER); $str.="Title:".$query->textfield(-name=>'title',-size=>80)."
"; $str.="Author:".$query->textfield(-name=>'author',-size=>50)."
"; $str.="ISBN:".$query->textfield(-name=>'isbn',-length=>15)."
"; $str.=htmlcode('closeform'); %] ---------------------------
